thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Italia Independent Group FY Pro-Forma EBITDA Loss Shrinks To EUR 2.5 mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Italia Independent Group FY Pro-Forma EBITDA Loss Shrinks To EUR 2.5 mln
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - ITALIA INDEPENDENT GROUP:
* REPORTED ON THURSDAY FY PRO-FORMA EBITDA LOSS EUR 2.5 MLN VS LOSS EUR 8.3 MLN A YEAR AGO
* FY PRO-FORMA TURNOVER OF EUR 25.9 MLN VS EUR 27.6 MLN YEAR AGO
* NET DEBT AT END-2017 STOOD AT EUR 24.4 MLN VS DEBT OF EUR 18.3 MLN YEAR AGO
* BOARD PLANS TO PROPOSE A RIGHTS ISSUE OF UP TO EUR 5 MLN Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
